Name: J.K. Rowling
Bio: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.

Name: George Orwell
Bio: English novelist, essayist, journalist, and critic.

Name: Jane Austen
Bio: English novelist known for her six major novels.

Name: Mark Twain
Bio: American writer, humorist, entrepreneur, publisher, and lecturer.

Name: Ernest Hemingway
Bio: American novelist, short story writer, and journalist.

Name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Bio: American novelist, known for The Great Gatsby.

Name: Agatha Christie
Bio: English writer known for her 66 detective novels.

Name: Leo Tolstoy
Bio: Russian writer, regarded as one of the greatest authors of all time.

Name: Virginia Woolf
Bio: English writer, considered one of the most important modernist authors.
